tool_description: Get main article content and meta data from news articles or blog entries.
title: Article Extractor

api_list.name: POST /article/parse
api_list.description: Extract main article and meta data from a news entry or blog post.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor2.p.rapidapi.com/article/parse"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
